ModMetaData.name: El's Tribal Water
ModMetaData.author: Ellit
ModMetaData.description: Adds tools that relieve tribal colonies' heavy reliance on wood, including an alternative water cooler that uses berries as fuel; a jade cooler that reacts with insect jelly to chill a room and refridgerate food; and a slow-burning cloth torch. Plus, a tribal equivalent of firefoam poppers: a barrel of water!
